### Where I come from
My name is Xiaoke (Coco) Zou. I come from Nanjing, China. I graduated from UCLA, major in Chemical Engineering, Biomolecular Option. I worked in Biotechnology lab for more than two years, focusing on free carbon fixation and enzyme assay researches.
